isis.stitle: DT/DTI-466 A and B Series DT/DTI/DTA-466 C Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1993) - ENGINE PERFORMANCE ANALYSIS GUIDES - ENGINE TEST NOMENCLATURE - CRANKCASE PRESSURE

svcproc.title: CRANKCASE PRESSURE
svcproc.para: This test measures the restricted combustion "blow-by" gas flow as designed by the crankcase breather system. It is measured in inches of water. Constant monitoring of this pressure will allow one to follow internal engine power cylinder wear.
Positive crankcase pressure is normal and is intentionally designed into the engines. Readings recorded beyond guideline tolerances signal a need to completely review engine condition.
